metadata.title: EH Services - Professional Web Development Agency
metadata.description: Transform your digital presence with custom WordPress and React websites. Professional web development services in Germany.
metadata.keywords: web development, WordPress, React, custom websites, web agency, Germany

hero.title: We Build
hero.description: We develop powerful websites that deliver results. From idea to launch – we design modern, fast, and scalable websites that perfectly match your brand.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive web development solutions tailored to your business needs

wordpress.title: WordPress Development
wordpress.description: Individually designed websites – clearly structured, mobile-optimized, and user-friendly. Whether simple business page or e-commerce solution: We professionally implement your ideas.

react.title: React Development
react.description: Modern, scalable web applications built with React, Next.js, and cutting-edge technologies.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: User-centered design that combines aesthetics with functionality for maximum engagement.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Regular updates, security checks, and technical support – so that your website always remains current, secure, and stable.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Improve your search rankings and drive organic traffic with our SEO expertise.

hosting.title: Hosting Solutions
hosting.description: Fast and secure hosting on German servers. We handle the setup and ensure maximum availability of your website.

professional.name: Gold Package
professional.description: Perfect for small businesses, freelancers and service providers

enterprise.name: Platinum Package
enterprise.description: Ideal for online shops and growth-oriented companies

custom.title: Need Something Custom?
custom.description: Every business is unique. Let's discuss your specific requirements and create a tailored solution.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences, EH Services has grown into a trusted web development agency serving businesses across Germany and beyond. We combine technical expertise with creative vision to deliver websites that not only look stunning but drive real business results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with innovative web solutions that enhance their digital presence and drive sustainable growth.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every project receives our full attention and expertise.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay at the forefront of web technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear communication and honest pricing are the foundation of our client relationships.

results.title: Results Driven
results.description: Our success is measured by the success of our clients' digital presence.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: A dedicated team of designers, developers, and strategists committed to your success.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
q1.answer: The duration depends heavily on the scope of the project. A simple website (e.g., one-pager) can be realized in a few days, while more extensive projects (with shop, multiple pages, etc.) can take between 2 and 6 weeks.

q2.question: How much do your services cost?
q2.answer: We can only answer this question after the first consultation. Before we talk about prices, we want to understand exactly what you need. Only then do we calculate a fair flat rate – no hidden costs, no hourly billing. You pay exactly what we agree on together.

q3.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer various maintenance packages to keep your website secure, updated, and performing optimally. This includes regular backups, security updates, and content updates.

q4.question: Can I edit my website myself?
q4.answer: Yes, you can. You can adjust and update the content of your website yourself. If you wish, we can also take over the maintenance for you – for a fair monthly maintenance fee.

q5.question: Do you work with clients outside of Germany?
q5.answer: Yes, we work with clients globally. Our team is fluent in both German and English, and we're experienced in remote collaboration across different time zones.

q6.question: Do you offer SEO services?
q6.answer: Yes, SEO is a fixed part of our offer. We optimize every website technically and structurally so that it is well findable on Google. Extended SEO strategies are also possible on request.

q7.question: Do I need to provide my own images?
q7.answer: Not necessarily. You can gladly provide your own images – this creates personality and recognition value. Alternatively, we use licensed, high-quality images.

q8.question: How does the development process work?
q8.answer: We coordinate every step closely with you and only deliver when you are 100% satisfied.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: We're here to help. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
